TopicTitle: A new astronaut just got hired.

Articles.Content:
So, I've had KSP for a month or so, and I am enjoying it like riding through the heavens. I have landed on Eve and Duna (Only Rover on Duna), but I can't land on the Mun. Apart from that, I have been enjoying the game for the time I have had it. The only thing I ask you is that, how do you change your profile picture and how do you get a skybox?

P.S- I've made a full blown mock up shuttle program.

Hello Rjtaml, and welcome to the forum. You will need to post a few more times (to prove you are not a spambot) before your account status changes and you have permission to personalize your account with an avatar. Someome will probably come along in a moment and recommend a skybox mod for you, but that's not my area of expertise. One thing I might be able to help with, though, is Mun missions. I wrote an illustrated walkthrough which comes with a (sandbox) trainer ship you can download. You can find it here. I hope it helps. It is harder to land without parachutes, isn't it? But you'll get it with practice.
Thanks! I'll take a punch toward the walk-through and the trainer ship.

Haha. I know I was all over Kerbin before I ever came close to landing on Mun. That definitely took some work, and some youtuber goodness.

Good luck! Oh. Vanamonde does good work AND is great cut in half with icecream and chocolate (banana split).

Enjoy!
